page.title: 09LAMPLUGH POST OFFICE
page.content: On 3.1.85 the Post Office moved to High Mill Gill Head. The services are selling Stamps, Postal Orders, Premium Bonds, Saving Certificates, Dog Licences, Giros, National Insurance, Pensions, Family Allowances and Savings Bank. There are four post boxes in Lamplugh and three postmen that empty them twice a day. The Post Office is open three days a week. The busiest time of year is Xmas as they close, so everyone rushes to send cards and parcels. The Post Office is open 9am till 4pm without a break. The 1st class stamp costs 17p and 2nd costs 13p. If anybody wanted to take up a Post Office they would have to sign a letter of secrecy and aren't allowed to show anyone confidential details or they will lose their job.
